thread.title: 29 Genuinely Funny Tweets That Will Make Women Cackle
thread.title_full: 29 Genuinely Funny Tweets That Will Make Women Cackle

author: Jenna Guillaume
title: 29 Genuinely Funny Tweets That Will Make Women Cackle
text:
View this image › 
Twitter: @jameelajoie ID: 10675872 3. Because there are no women to organise it? RT @angelicantoniox: Why isn't international men's day celebrated like women's day
— Richard K Herring (@Herring1967) ID: 10675612 4. attention men: pls stop telling us you want to go down on us for "hours". thats way too long. we have stuff to do. i've got a lasagne cookin
— beth mccoll (@imteddybless) ID: 10675510 5. View this image › 
Twitter: @_cooper ID: 10675516 6. Guy 1: OK. Nail polish on the hand means it's a woman. Guy 2: You can't see the other hand's nails. How do we make… https://t.co/Dc38kOjZ7y
— Conor Smith (@conorsmith) ID: 10675619 7. guys: women are a mystery. women: Here is what we- guys: LITERALLY WHAT DO THEY WANT? women: well for start- guys: Guess we'll never know!
— Sophia Benoit (@1followernodad) ID: 10675535 8. Dolls teach girls very unrealistic body standards. A Russian doesn't have to have many tiny Russians inside her to be beautiful.
— Megan Amram (@meganamram) ID: 10675538 9. Art depicting all 3 species of twitter men: 1) Actually... 2) Unsolicited dick pic 3) 3rd wheel barging into convo
— ♡ brian essbe ♡ (@SortaBad) ID: 10675889 10. View this image › 
Twitter: @RobbySlowik ID: 10675894 11. WOMAN: I wish to no longer be mansplained things GENIE: Okay {POOF} *turns her into a guy* MAN: What I actually meant was… GENIE: oh jeez
— Todd 'Papi' Carlos (@TheToddWilliams) ID: 10675542 12. As a woman, I just hope that one day I have as many rights as a gun does.
— Alison Leiby (@AlisonLeiby) ID: 10675596 13. MEN REPLYING TO WOMEN ONLINE
— Anthony (@butterwolf) ID: 10675606 14. GOD: Let there be women WOMEN: Cool GOD: But no pockets WOMEN: What? GOD: Put your stuff in a bag lol MEN: lol GOD: lol
— drewtoothpaste (@drewtoothpaste) ID: 10675610 15. Man: I'll never date a feminist Feminists: True
— Jessica Valenti (@JessicaValenti) ID: 10675645 16. yet ANOTHER unrealistic standard for women smh
— frazzled ms. frizzle (@hashtag_dta) ID: 10675697 17. Sitting in a room with my husband and kids... Suddenly I realise everyone here has been in my vagina. Wow
— L A M I (@BlacHershey) ID: 10675644 18. "men don't find it attractive when yo-" wOW for a second there I almost thought women lived just to please men haha almost scared me there
— on her period (@onherperiod) ID: 10675716 19. Carry yourself w/the confidence of a girl holding a massive owl.
— Rebecca Slatkin (@RebeccaSlatkin) ID: 10675858 20. LADIES! Does YOUR MAN need a surprise in the bedroom? ;) cover his face in egg while he sleeps
— Dee (@figgled) ID: 10675752 21. how can anyone argue that sexuality is a choice when there are still lots of women left who will date men
— Bec Shaw (@Brocklesnitch) ID: 10675840 22. I don’t need femims because we have lost too many men to the friendzone. The zone where they get to be friends with women. It’s a nightmare
— WomanAgainstFeminism (@NoToFeminism) ID: 10675772 23. We asked 500 men what they look for in a woman and then set them adrift on a raft screaming, because just kidding who cares
— audrey farnsworth (@audipenny) ID: 10675731 24. Gender Inequality: A woman continues to have to do a LOT more than a man to get to the same position.
— bollyglot gifs (@BollyglotGifs) ID: 10675791 25. Started to call men "buddy" or "champ" who call me "honey" or "sweetheart" at work. The confusion on their faces is priceless.
— Your Pal Tabby (@Tabrakadabra) ID: 10675509 26. [inventing dogs] God: ur mans best friend Dog: pretty sexist God: no, man as in every-fuck it u can't talk Dog: ... God: & chocolate kills u
— David Hughes (@david8hughes) ID: 10675497 27. View this image › 
Twitter: @raichew ID: 10675860 28. I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to move because he's blocking my way to the cheese platter.
— Frankie (@phranqueigh) ID: 10675810 29. When the lyrics are lowkey misogynistic but the beat bangs
— hentai (@HibachiTashi) ID: 10675866 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Jenna Guillaume is Editor-at-Large for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
